include.description: Loads and executes a JS-Eden script file

parameters.object: A number or list to be converted

str.description: Converts a number or list to a string

int.description: Converts a string to an integer

Text.description: Creates a text element for display on the canvas

parameters.colour: Colour of the line in HTML form

Line.description: Creates a line element for display on the canvas

parameters.colour: Colour of the rectangle (fill) in HTML form

Rectangle.description: Creates a rectangle element for display on the canvas

parameters.fillcolour: Fill colour for the circle in HTML form
parameters.outlinecolour: Outline colour of the circle in HTML form

Circle.description: Creates a circle element for display on the canvas

Button.description: Creates a button element for display on the canvas

parameters.name: for [name]_clicked
parameters.options: A list of strings providing the options

Combobox.description: Creates a drop-down select box for the canvas
